title: Waylander II: In the Realm of the Wolf - David Gemmell V1.1
description:
Waylander II: In the Realm of the Wolf by David Gemmell
Version 1.0
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created in Sigil.

Perfectly formatted for the Kobo eBook reader.

Painstakingly converted from a .txt file into a proper .epub format including modern cover, indented and consistent formatting, and a Table of Contents.

This is my first draft, some minor problems may be found as the .txt file I used had poor formatting and missing sections of text. If you find any errors or issues, please leave a comment including the chapter and a description of the error. I will create updated versions.

More of David Gemmell's books will become available as I complete them. Enjoy!			

UPDATES:

 - Shortened name of file (Download SHOULD work now)

 - Added table of contents (missed in V1.0)
